title: Team Communication Chat
description:
Implement Real-Time Team Chat with Persistence and Presence

Build a fully functional team chat system that enables real-time messaging between users, persists message history, and displays user online/offline status.

Requirements:

**Core Chat Functionality:**
- Create a chat interface with message input and conversation display
- Implement real-time message delivery using WebSockets or similar technology
- Support multiple chat rooms or channels
- Display timestamps for each message
- Show sender information (name, avatar) for each message
- Implement message ordering (chronological)

**Message Persistence:**
- Store all messages in database with sender, timestamp, room/channel ID
- Load message history when users join a chat room
- Implement pagination or infinite scroll for loading older messages
- Ensure messages persist across user sessions and page refreshes

**User Presence Indicators:**
- Track and display online/offline status for all users
- Update presence in real-time when users connect/disconnect
- Show "typing" indicator when users are composing messages
- Display last seen timestamp for offline users
- Handle presence updates on connection loss/network issues

**Additional Considerations:**
- Handle connection failures and automatic reconnection
- Implement rate limiting to prevent message spam
- Sanitize message content to prevent XSS attacks
- Optimize for concurrent users in the same chat room
- Add error handling for failed message delivery
- Consider delivery confirmation/read receipts
- Test with multiple simultaneous users across different rooms

**Success Criteria:**
- Messages appear instantly for all connected users (<500ms latency)
- Message history loads correctly when joining any room
- Presence status updates within 5 seconds of user connection changes
- System handles at least 100 concurrent users reliably
